data.name: Build and Drive Racing
data.description:
Get hyped for the extended early access version of the mind-blowing Build and Drive Racing game! Brace yourselves for heart-pounding challenges, epic rides, sick tire upgrades, and mind-bending tracks. But guess what? It doesn't end here! We're just getting started and planning mind-blowing expansions. 

Get ready to unleash your inner racing genius as you construct the meanest, badest machine tailored to your driving style and juiced up for insane performance. Or if you're feeling wild, hop into a monster ride that'll make your face melt with excitement.

The game features:
- Challenge unlock system: complete challenges to unlock cars, wheels, levels
- Game modes: race against your ghost and beat your best lap or race against AI opponents
- Garage: customize your car

Coming soon:
- UX improvements
- New level and challenges
- New cars and addons
- New game modes

Get ready for an immersive racing experience and stay tuned for more thrilling updates!

We need your feedback to make this game absolute fire for you! Your thoughts and opinions matter, so don't hold back. 

Hit us up with those epic reviews, whether it's here, 
on Reddit:
https://www.reddit.com/r/buildanddriveracing/

or on Discord:
https://discord.gg/x3t7gGrrsX

We wanna know what you think, 'cause you're the boss ;-) Help us level up this game and let's create something legendary together.

The original price is 6.99 USD.
This $3.99 offer is available for a limited time only.
